title: HOSVD-based canonical form of TP functions and qLPV models
summary: Based on the key idea of higher-order singular value decomposition[1] (HOSVD) in tensor algebra, Baranyi and Yam proposed the concept of HOSVD-based canonical form of TP functions and quasi-LPV system models.[2][3] Szeidl et al.[4] proved that the TP model transformation[5][6] is capable of numerically reconstructing this canonical form.
